forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 66F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
